name: Cave Runner (Open-Source Metroidvania Game Template For Construct 2 & 3)
name_original: Cave Runner (Open-Source Metroidvania Game Template For Construct 2 & 3)
description:
Cave Runner is a comprehensive open-source metroidvania game template for Construct 2 & 3.

Features
  • Familiar Player Character with 4-way aiming
  • Items/Upgrades & Collection Sequence + Message Box
  • Unique Enemies & Destructibles
  • Room Transitions & Alignments + Dynamic Object Loading
  • Minimap System (In HUD & Subscreen)
  • HUD + Energy Tanks & Missile Counter
  • Subscreen + Item Tabs & Large Map View
  • Save Points & Save Data Management
  • Window Scaling / Positioning
  • Visual FX
  • Title Screen + Menu
  • Hot Lava (ouch!)
Additional Notes
  • Developed by Construct veterans
  • Fully commented events
  • Clean & organized project structure
  • No 3rd party addons
  • Packaged assets included
